Name: Apple iPhone 14
Description: Latest model of the Apple iPhone series with improved features.
LongDescription: The Apple iPhone 14 features a sleek design, advanced camera system, and powerful A15 Bionic chip, offering unparalleled performance and an exceptional user experience.

Name: Samsung Galaxy S21
Description: High-end smartphone from Samsung with excellent performance.
LongDescription: The Samsung Galaxy S21 boasts a dynamic AMOLED display, top-of-the-line Exynos 2100 processor, and a versatile camera setup, making it a top choice for smartphone enthusiasts.

Name: Sony WH-1000XM4
Description: Noise-cancelling over-ear headphones with superior sound quality.
LongDescription: Sony WH-1000XM4 headphones deliver industry-leading noise cancellation, exceptional sound quality, and all-day comfort, perfect for music lovers and frequent travelers.

Name: Dell XPS 13
Description: Compact and powerful laptop with a 13-inch display.
LongDescription: The Dell XPS 13 offers a stunning 13-inch InfinityEdge display, powerful Intel processors, and a lightweight, durable design, making it ideal for professionals on the go.

Name: Apple MacBook Air
Description: Lightweight and efficient laptop with Apple's M1 chip.
LongDescription: The Apple MacBook Air features the revolutionary M1 chip, delivering incredible performance and efficiency in a sleek, lightweight design, perfect for everyday computing needs.

Name: Google Pixel 6
Description: Google's flagship smartphone with an advanced camera.
LongDescription: The Google Pixel 6 offers a stunning display, powerful Google Tensor chip, and an advanced camera system that captures stunning photos and videos in any lighting condition.

Name: Banana
Description: A sweet and nutritious fruit, perfect for snacking.
LongDescription: Bananas are a delicious and convenient snack, rich in potassium and vitamins, providing a quick energy boost and supporting heart health.

Name: Apple
Description: Crisp and juicy, available in various varieties.
LongDescription: Apples are a versatile fruit, available in a variety of flavors and textures, perfect for snacking, baking, and adding to salads for a crisp, juicy bite.

Name: Orange
Description: A citrus fruit rich in Vitamin C, great for juicing.
LongDescription: Oranges are a popular citrus fruit, packed with Vitamin C and antioxidants, ideal for juicing, snacking, and adding a tangy flavor to various dishes.

Name: Strawberry
Description: Sweet and tart berries, perfect for desserts and snacks.
LongDescription: Strawberries are sweet, juicy berries, perfect for desserts, smoothies, and snacks, offering a burst of flavor and numerous health benefits.

Name: Broccoli
Description: A healthy green vegetable, rich in vitamins and minerals.
LongDescription: Broccoli is a nutritious green vegetable, rich in vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants, great for steaming, roasting, and adding to a variety of dishes.

Name: Carrot
Description: A crunchy and sweet vegetable, great for salads and snacks.
LongDescription: Carrots are a crunchy, sweet vegetable, perfect for salads, snacking, and cooking, packed with beta-carotene, fiber, and essential nutrients.

Name: Lettuce
Description: A fresh and crisp leafy green, ideal for salads.
LongDescription: Lettuce is a fresh, crisp leafy green, ideal for salads, sandwiches, and wraps, offering a low-calorie source of vitamins and minerals.

Name: Tomato
Description: Juicy and versatile, perfect for salads, sauces, and sandwiches.

Name: Cucumber
Description: Cool and refreshing, great for salads and snacks.

Name: Potato
Description: A versatile vegetable, perfect for baking, frying, and mashing.

Name: Onion
Description: A flavorful vegetable, essential for many dishes.

Name: Garlic
Description: A pungent and flavorful bulb, used in many cuisines.
LongDescription: Garlic is a pungent, flavorful bulb, used in many cuisines to enhance the flavor of dishes, offering numerous health benefits and culinary versatility.

Name: Sony PlayStation 5
Description: Next-generation gaming console with advanced graphics.
LongDescription: The Sony PlayStation 5 delivers next-generation gaming with advanced graphics, lightning-fast load times, and an extensive library of exclusive games.

Name: Xbox Series X
Description: Powerful gaming console from Microsoft with 4K gaming.
LongDescription: The Xbox Series X offers powerful 4K gaming, quick resume functionality, and a vast game library, providing an immersive gaming experience.

Name: Nintendo Switch
Description: Hybrid gaming console for home and portable play.
LongDescription: The Nintendo Switch is a versatile hybrid gaming console, allowing for both home and portable play, with a wide range of exclusive games and features.
